subject: Question about simsonn pro pedal compatibility
description_text:
Hello,

I purchased the simsonn pro plus pedals last year before that model was
discontinued. If I bought one of the new control boxes for the haptics
would that still work with my pedals? and would that allow me to use the
simsonn manager software, as well as the haptics?

Thank you :-)

Joey Garcia

conversations.body_text: Hi，Joey Garcia，    您可以直接从我们的官方网站购买一套包含 PlusX 控制板、振动电机和独立电源的套装， 从而实现振动反馈支持。 为了更好地服务我们的忠实客户，控制盒以接近成本价出售，物超所值。

Hello, I have another question about the tariffs on items shipped to the
US. I ordered the spring upgrade kit for my simsonn pro plus pedals. I
assumed the item would ship from a US warehouse but now that my order is
tracking I see that it is coming from china. What will the tariff charge
be? if you are able to check or confirm that  I would greatly appreciate it.

Thank you :-)

Joey

On Fri, Jun 6, 2025 at 5:18 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Joey Garcia, The declared value of the upgrade kit is very low, so it should incur little to no customs duties. If any duties do arise, feel free to contact us—we're open to discussing it and may cover the cost if needed.
